attributes.action: ensure that Dave Goodings washes at least once a week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: well, he is greasy, smelly and truelly horrible. please make sure he washes at least once a week by signing your name. it is unhealthy and your name WILL make a difference

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
